DataElement.preferredName: Product Investigation Performed Observation Outcome Uncertain Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information captured while conducting research on a product. EXAMPLE(S): An electrical problem in a device. A coded value specifying whether and to what degree this evaluation or observation has been asserted to be in doubt in any way. EXAMPLE(S): A patient might have had a cholecystectomy procedure in the past, but isn't sure what the outcome was.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Product Investigation Performed Observation Outcome Uncertain Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._Not established beyond doubt; still undecided or unknown.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.
